name: Minimalist Visual Style
description: Simple and clean with minimal elements, negative space, and essential design

prompt.base: Minimalist style, simple composition, clean lines, negative space, essential elements only, uncluttered design, minimal color palette, geometric simplicity, zen aesthetic, less is more
prompt.positive: minimalist design, simple composition, clean lines, negative space, minimal elements, uncluttered, essential design, geometric shapes, limited color palette, zen aesthetic, simple beauty, elegant simplicity, white space
prompt.negative: cluttered, busy composition, excessive detail, ornate decoration, complex patterns, maximalist, chaotic, overly detailed, baroque style

technical.rendering: Clean simple rendering with minimal elements
technical.lighting: Simple even lighting or single light source
technical.detail_level: Minimal detail focusing on essential elements

variations.name: Scandinavian Minimalism
variations.modifier: natural materials, neutral colors, functional design, cozy simplicity, hygge aesthetic

variations.name: Japanese Minimalism
variations.modifier: zen philosophy, wabi-sabi aesthetic, natural elements, contemplative space, traditional influence

variations.name: Modern Minimalism
variations.modifier: geometric forms, monochrome palette, industrial materials, contemporary design, stark simplicity

examples: A minimalist interior with clean lines, white walls, single furniture piece, abundant negative space
A simple geometric composition with limited color palette, clean design, minimalist aesthetic
